mapper.insert: insert into acd_tb(acd_id, acd_code_id, acd_latitude, acd_longitude, acd_date, acd_remark, acd_take, sh_id) values(SEQ_ACD_ID.nextval, #{acd_code_id}, #{acd_latitude},#{acd_longitude},#{acd_date}, null, '신고접수', #{sh_id})
mapper.select: select * from (select rownum as rn, a.* from (select * from acd_tb order by acd_date desc)a where rownum <= #{endLine}) where rn >= #{startLine}
mapper.insert: insert into acd_hnd_tb (acd_hnd_id, acd_id, acd_hnd_content, acd_hnd_date, acd_hnd_take) values(seq_acd_hnd.nextval, #{acd_id}, #{acd_hnd_content}, sysdate+1, #{acd_hnd_take} )
mapper.select: select * from acd_hnd_tb where acd_id = #{acd_id} order by acd_hnd_date asc
